content: here is the description to the round textured doily driada the description is available in 2 languages english eng and russian rus the pattern includes written instructions u s terms used with detailed explanation of all special stitches colored chart level advanced the pattern has 19 rounds the finished doily measures approx 9 21-22 cm the finished size depends on your gauge and materials you have chosen materials cotton thread size 10 hook 1 50 or 1 75 mm but you may use the materials you prefer in this pattern i used next special stitches splits puff stitches fp-/bp- stitches popcorns picots
